hovertext: Rosena Allin-Khan
Income Categories
Employment
11 May 2017, received £297.84 for two shifts, on 15 and 17 April 2017. Hours: 24 hrs in total.

Allowances received as a Councillor for Wandsworth Council, The Town Hall, Wandsworth High Street, London SW18 2
PU. Hours: 5-10 hrs per week, depending on workload.
From July 2017 I receive £505.51 a month. Hours: approx. 10 hrs a week.
